website_summaries.verdict: This peekaboo canopy model stays shut better than some other styles.
pros: Zipper openings allow you to check on baby without removing entire canopy

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely in love with this
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this. The material is high quality. It is thick to keep my baby warm. There is no hole at the sides for sure. The zipper is wonder to allow air in. There are button on the top to secure the opening. It fits my car seat really well. Also, love the little pouch that I can just stuff the canope in when I don't use it. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lyncie

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, colors as pictured, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover!!! The colors are as vivid as pictured, material is super stretchy, not too thick and not too thin. Very very soft (I want a shirt made out of it lol). Perfect for a “southern” winter (40 degrees and higher). My baby does not like to be layered in hot clothing and blankets and stuff so this is perfect! It blocks out all air from getting through so I can just cover baby in a light blanket and hat, even when it’s cold outside! Fits my Graco click connect car seat just fine. Worth every penny, especially for winter babies!
customer_reviews.author: jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. So happy.
customer_reviews.text: I can't express how happy I am with this cover. It's flu season here in Texas. I have two infants and these are perfect. I have a graco snugride 35 click connect. I don't have to adjust cover to take in or out. I can zip up or leave open. The babies easily fit in the opening provided. The material moves with ease yet goes back into position. Very satisfied customer. I have had a few months. Had those covers that go over handle. I returned. This is a wonderful product. Picture is one baby at a doctor appointment. So glad I can seal him up. :)
customer_reviews.author: tonyazzz

customer_reviews.title: So great! Stretchy and soft and thick and the pattern ...
customer_reviews.text: So great! Stretchy and soft and thick and the pattern is lovely! I wish the mosquito netting had an additional elastic band on the very bottom to help keep it taunt, but I’m still really happy with it. Would 100% recommend! Definitely think it’s good for both summer and winter use, and I love that it’s machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber I

customer_reviews.title: Soft, wind resistant and functional
customer_reviews.text: (Placed on Graco Snug Ride 30) We live in a very cold, windy state and the fabric is stretchy and warm. It's also super soft! The hole is wide enough that I can get the baby in and out without having to remove the cover, and leaves most of the handle exposed for a secure grip. We have no problem with the canopy on the carseat. I leave it up to round out the cover a little better. I am very pleased with this product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shandess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carseat cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect carseat cover. Super soft material with nice design. Stretches nicely over carseat and can be left on when carseat is put on the base in the car. I like this cover because it doesn't come near the baby's face when zipped like other covers. The zippers make it easier to check on your little one, while still keeping them sheltered from people when out in public. Protects nicely from the wind and the mosquito net is great. I haven't used the net just yet but I'm sure I will! Well worth the money and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JMM31

customer_reviews.title: Super wonderful for windy or cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Super wonderful for windy or cold weather!! We used this during the cold months and it was nice not to take something off and on all the time. You can easily put the handle up or down without much restriction, just open the zippers and put back the flap first so the material isn't next to their face when it's down. It is thicker for cold weather but still has breathability if you leave the top open a little with the flap behind it. It's super soft and great quality and fit our Graco Snugride Click Connect perfectly. A friend recommended this and I have since recommended it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: I have had lots of car seat covers over the years and have had frustrations with most (too bulky, too hot, not visually appealing, ect.), but with my 3rd baby, I FINALLY found one I like. The material is soft and stretchy. It covers the seat great and opens up wide for easy access. The material keeps baby safe from the elements, but is breathable and the design is adorable and gender neutral. A bonus was the top pocket, which holds my wallet and phone perfectly for quick grabs. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Walls

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for new parents, especially in cold places!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Just wish they had more designs or color options -- bought this for my baby girl, keeps her nice and warm (with a blanket of course!) My only comment about this is I wish the little flap would hold the mosquito net better, occasionally it falls out and onto my babies head! :(
customer_reviews.author: L. Sandino

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Great use for the cooler weather but after removing it to wash one of the buttons broke. Also if you use this with a click connect stroller it can be a bit annoying to lift the bottom high enough while hold the car seat over the stroller to connect it. Also, after using it for a couple days I realized this car seat cover isn't the best if you need to quickly remove your child from the car seat (i.e. If you're ever in an accident or go into water).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great but the bottom wont stay down
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept and I really do like the cover BUT the bottom part will NOT stay down. It is forever coming up and out pops my baby's little feet. It would have been a five star if I could keep the front down
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: No more cold air on my baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love how well this fits our car seat (Chicco Keyfit 30 zip)! The material is super soft and the lining cozy. Getting baby in and out is super easy. We had a JJ Cole cover where the cover opening would flap open in the wind, and the cover never fit very snug (esp around the carseat handle where it connected to the base) so cold air would get into the carseat where baby is. This cover is so convenient and takes care of my worries about my baby in the cold winter air.
customer_reviews.author: eFaith

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price but could be designed better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for the canopy peekaboo opening in the front. This was a convenient feature and I like it immensely. The fabric is very soft and stretchy. It would have been better if there was an opening at the top where the handle of the car seat could go through like some of the other cover designs I've seen. The anti mosquito netting is a nice idea but when not in use and stored in the mesh pocket of the top flap, there is no zipper or anything to keep it secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Soft, fully enclosed cover.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it outside the house yet, but the cover is very cute and soft. Fits perfect on my Chico Key Fit. Like that it has to top flap to fully enclose my baby when we take him or her home from the hospital and to use for doctors appointments. I’ve used the canopy covers for my other children but like how this stays covered completely in the times of Covid. Hopefully it holds up over time. Fox design is even cuter in person!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon I.

customer_reviews.title: Love this soft product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product super soft, nice soft tender colors. Very convenient with a zipper also has a mesh that you can use over the opening, but if you don’t want to use it you can tuck it in on top there’s a pocket pouch. Very soft definitely good for the cold weather it will keep baby warm. The inside material is different from the outside, the best way to describe it, it’s like Hanes sweatpants(the outside material as well as the inside soft material) great material!! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Bought for our baby’s car seat for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought for our baby’s car seat for the fall/winter. The inside is a fleece-like texture so it’s pretty warm. You still need to put your baby in warm clothes but this doesn’t allow that harsh wind to blow through as long as you wrap the car seat with this cover properly. Make sure there are no gaps/openings around the edges of the car seat when you wrap this over it and your good to go!
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute, soft, and works great! It's nice and thick so I think it will keep baby nice and warm this winter. I love the elastic bottom to keep it from flying up in the wind like so many covers do. The zippers are good quality and I like that you can easily zip it up open or closed depending on how visible you want baby. I have the Chicco Keyfit and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonaddictTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This carseat cover is so cute... Detail is good & not blurry... Even includes a mesh part that I didn't even know was included lol... It was a bit tricky to get over the visor part of the carseat. I would start from the back perhaps then over the front... But other wise a good product. The material feels strong enough to keep out wind but light at the same time if that makes sense lol.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, soft, warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover for the winter. The inside is super soft fleece and traps heat very well. I just found it very annoying that when I wanted to put the handle all the way back I had to almost take the cover all the way off the car seat. I used this for my daughter who was 3 months at the time and I found that her feet were always trapped in it when I had it opened
customer_reviews.author: David Amerson

customer_reviews.title: Great for a pandemic!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I have searched and searched and searched for carseat covers! Especially with this covid-19 going around I want to be prepared as soon as my baby arrives! This cover is a medium priced cover. Super cute. So soft! Very durable. Itll last a long long while. The zippers are very nice and durable. The material is thick but not too thick! I would totally recommend buying this and I will be purchasing another! It's a good deal right under 18$ considering the simple ones cost 40$!! And you get a little window with this one!! You peak in and see his little face too without unzipping!
customer_reviews.author: Cristyn m

customer_reviews.title: The best infant car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: I saw another mom with this cover at school drop off and I raaaaan over to ask her about it! I immediating ordered it on my amazon app and got it the next day! I love the how zippers make it easy to get baby in and out without taking the whole thing off. The best part is it keeps strangers from breathing their germs on my newborn or sticking their nasty hands in my baby’s face, so that’s worth it to me! The mosquito netting is kinda awkward to use and I dont anticipate using it very often. I just tuck it between to cover and the car seat visor and it’s out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: You need this car seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I live in MN and it has been great keeping my little one warm this winter. No snow suit just a blanket tucked around him and he stays nice and cozy. Only minor issue I have is there is no way to secure the flap by the handle. The wind does blow it back so there is a very small opening but my son still stays warm so like I said minor issue. I plan to use velcro to attach it to the main part of the cover. I've gotten tons of compliments on it already. I wish I had something like this with my other children.
customer_reviews.author: Beegurl

customer_reviews.title: Quite cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover because it’s soft. I thought it was a different waterproof material, but it’s not. It’s like a fleecey type material. It’s effective and blocks wind and drizzle from baby. It fits on very easily. My only issue is that as your baby grows, when using this it prevents baby from being able to stretch their legs out. Ie there are baby feet pressing through which I think annoys my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Christal S

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is the softest I've ever felt and the pull down mesh screen is a life saver! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this cover. I absolutely love the mesh netting that you can pull down to cover your baby and keep her safer from germs. It allows people to have a look but not put her at risk. Its very stretchy and is unbelievably soft. If you're looking for a trendy, versatile, safe cover for your carseat, order now! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashli Grim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful car seat cover!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not usually one to write a review but this cover is simply AWESOME. Where we live the winters are so cold and the wind makes it especially cold but I didn’t want a winter car seat cover where I couldn’t use the canopy (most bundle me winter covers you have to remove the canopy from your infant seat). This cover is thick and warm with the extra fuzzy lining and I love that I can keep the cover on and just unzip it to get my daughter out. The fabric is very soft and very high quality & the snaps and zippers seem very sturdy also. I highly recommend this cover and the inexpensive price is great too!!
customer_reviews.author: StarlightCreekHomeschool

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Gosh I love this thing! It's adorable, sooo soft, and looks great on the car seat! I tested it out before our daughter arrived and it's a no brainers. I really prefer it over the typical stretch over seat covers because of the little mesh window flap. People can see the baby, but not touch! Great to have especially during the pandemic we are going through and how people have really stopped caring about other's safety lately. I honestly plan to use these seat covers as my go-to baby shower gift from now on!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this so far. It’s strong but stretchy enough to fit over the infant carseat (chicco key fit30). My son was nice and warm in this, in the 30 degree weather. I love that it zips open and has the optional net cover. I washed it with his clothes and it came out perfectly fine. I have the other carseat cover that is also a nursing cover, etc, but it stretched out badly and its definitely not warm enough for the colder months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover! No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat cover is wonderful! My baby is a premie and was born right at flu and RSV season, having this cover has made me feel more at ease bringing him out when I absolutely have to. It’s a GREAT cover. Wonderful quality! I love that there is a net option as well. I am concerned that in the summer it would be way too hot because it is a good thick material, but for the winter it’s perfect! It doesn’t allow rain in like most stretchy covers and I love that I can partially unzip it so I can peak at baby without fear of someone trying to touch him!
customer_reviews.author: Nwats

customer_reviews.title: The Buttons keep it in place, easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover. It’s wind resistant like it says, up to a point. It stretches over the car seat pretty easy. We have a Nuna car seat. The black stripes loses a little color when it’s stretched on like it’s being stretched too far, which isn’t the case, there is plenty of material. Other than that it’s exactly as described. The buttons on the top are really nice for keeping the cover centered. I get so frustrated with the ones that flop off or slide to the side. Completely defeats the purpose. This one stays in place. I’m most likely going to order another just because we use ours so much.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car seat cover. I’ve tried different ones with my 2 yr old when she was a baby, and had tried another one before making this purchase with my now 3 week old, didnt like it, we have the Graco Snugride snuglock 35 elite car seat, the handle is a bit bulkier than most car seats, which is the reason why we werent too satisfied with the last cover we purchased at the store! I didnt want a cover that needed to be removed to put my baby in and out of the car seat! Definitely worth my money, love the colors and the soft inner linning, and i also love the stretchy non cheap look!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: This cover is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is the best one I have tried yet! I’ve bought at least 4 other covers and they can’t compair. Price is on point as I’ve spent more on a cheaper feeling crappy cover. Wish I had this when my other was little. Very warm and soft material. Keeps people from touching baby in the store! Also has this cool net you can put over to keep bugs out if you are outside! I would recommend this to anyone with an infant.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement- NO mesh liner
customer_reviews.text: This product is falsely advertised. There is no mesh liner for mosquito and bug protection. It's a shame because it's really soft and a super cute design. I'm upset that I used a discount to get this and now will have to pay full price for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Marie Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Car Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier to use than a blanket. The cover doesn't blow around and it helps keep babe warm. We live in a fairly cold area and so far so good it's been great! Another great perk with this cover is that unwelcome touchers are put off! The only downside I can find is that I wish there was a feature to go under the seat or clip to the sides so that you could zip it one handed, as is now it wants to pull up when you just pull the zipper. Not a deal breaker though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-a-holic

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever for mn winter
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this! It fits my graco car seat perfectly. The material is thick so I don’t even have to bundle my daughter up before heading out in a MN winter. When I take her out, she’s just as warm as when I put her in! The zippers are nice too. As soon as I get her in the car, I unzip so she can see around.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Good product for cold winters
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product a few times so far and seems to be as expected. Better than a blanket or the flat car seat covers that we were using. It fits pretty well but does get loose in the back and touch baby’s head so I just pull it tight each use. He’s not able to kick it off. It keeps him warm, almost too warm at times. We have to use a very thin blanket or not blanket at all, so very useful for winters. I do love that I don’t need to take it off every time the opening is big enough. Good product would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Not loving it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because where I live it is very windy and needed something to come my baby with. First of all the cover keeps sliding up and uncovering baby’s feet. The buttons by handle keep popping open. But my least liked thing about this cover is this patch/ pocket by handle that sticks out and it’s supposed to keep the net inside. Terrible, just terrible. Always hits my baby in the face. All in all not a very helpful product
customer_reviews.author: NIKOLINA MALETIC

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great for Graco Fastaction Fold Jogger Click Connect Baby Travel System, Gotham
customer_reviews.text: Used with my Click Connect Carseat/Stroller combo, this car seat cover doesn't interfere with any of the "locks" for the car base or stroller. Has a built in bug net which is awesome as we are outdoors a lot! the zipper in the middle is perfect to get my newborn in/out of the carseat and I love that it zips up or down so that i dont have to cover her face with a blanket to shield her face from the wind/sun.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to use on our Britax car seat and works great. I do leave 1 of the snaps open so it's easier to carry since I carry the carseat on the bend of my arm. I was looking for a fitted cover since I used a 'loose' one with my daughter and it would fly all over rather than cover her. It's easy to put on and remove. I get compliments all the time. Material definitely on the thicker side, still ok for warmer days IMO. For winter months, baby would still need a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: olguis

customer_reviews.title: Every Mom needs one of these.
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft this is. I also like how you can open the front but my baby is still protected and covered up from all sides. I bought this before Covid hit and I'm glad I did. With us having to wear masks everywhere I felt my baby needs to somehow be covered too (I only take him out when I absolutely have to) so this is perfect. It's also great for when it rains, its thick so the rain won't soak through quickly. It does get a little stuffy and warm inside but when it does I just unzip the front and let fresh air in.
customer_reviews.author: KEESHA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one I bought...lol..I like to mix it up a bit...even though the first one the button...fell off but, it was fixable with alittle strong glue....I totally love these for my baby and plan to use them in the future when we decide to have second one...anywho, I don't recommend it using it during in the summer it gets really warm in it.Lastly, the fabric is super soft and the prints haven't fade away.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Some have nets, some do not!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! But make sure you pay attention to which prints have the netting and which do not. I ordered these specifically for the mosquito netting because they are so bad at my house. I had these on my baby registry for my twins and the grey and whitE one didn’t have the netting. I wasn’t able to return it because I had it too long before I finally used it. The pink one and the blue and yellow one have the netting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall love it.
customer_reviews.text: I just love how soft this car seat protector is. Plus it’s nice I don’t have to remove the canopy off my car seat it just slides right over it. Nice and stretchy. Love the night net to that can be easily tucked away when not in use. Also love how easy it will be to get baby out since I can just simply unzip it. The only thing that stopped me from giving it 5 stars is the fact that it came with a brown smudge on one of the front white elephants. So it’s pretty noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: lillie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best carseat covers out there...It surrounds the carseat like a tent rather than sit on top of it, my baby has been so comfortable in it....With this COVID-19 pandemic going on, it gives me peace of mind having my baby covered and protected IF I do have to take him out...It does stretch out a little with constant use, just wash and dry it and it goes back to its original size, also, I never needed to completely remove it to snap him into the carseat base, pull down on the cover just a bit to get seat belt buckled!
customer_reviews.author: Monique H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: it’s not bad, but it’s not great. The issues I have - baby can kick the cover from the bottom and it will slide up off the car seat. -makes it difficult to put baby into the car seat -makes it difficult to buckle the baby with seatbelt latch -I wish it had a clear keyhole area to look at baby without having to unzip the cover -material is thick and will keep baby warm
customer_reviews.author: VeeSki

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: (Wife leaving review) I love this cover I just wish they had more boyish colors (other than black and white) I love how it has zippers and the mesh. I haven't removed it since baby was born, has been 3 months. Keeps baby warm, if it's too cold outside like under 30° I add a blanket. But I love how it keeps wind or even a little of rain from getting to the baby. I love how I don't have to be careful of blanket flying away or checking if wind is getting to baby thru the sides. It fits the chicco keyfit 30 carseat. It's also made with good quality fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Lucho

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat cover there is!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS COVER! Every parent always asks me about this because of how functional this is! Love the fabric this is made out of- it’s breathable for the warmer seasons (spring and fall) but also warm enough for the cold season too (didn’t need the fleece car seat lining because of how warm it stays with the cover on)!!! I love you can zip and unzip to your liking, and your baby can sleep uninterrupted! Major plus is the attached bug net. Already bought this for a new mom and recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cover! With the winter here in the midwest in full swing this cover keeps my daughter from getting the brunt of the wind. It fits our Chico Key fit seat snugly and doesn't fall or move around. I would highly recommend this cover to anyone with a newborn or infant. The zipper makes getting the kiddo in and out of the seat a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Thick, soft, stretchy fabric that fits perfectly on our carseats. Exceptional value! Update 3/17 - This was wonderful while it lasted. One of the top snaps tore away from the fabric and the second snap isn't strong enough on it's own, so now the material falls down onto our baby. We can no longer use this for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: C. Durnin

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional and soft
customer_reviews.text: This item is cute, super soft and functions as advertised. I wouldn't recommend zipping it up all the way when outside during the summer but it works extremely well indoors to keep bright lights from waking baby and prying hands out. I only wish it had a small hole to see sleeping baby when it's zipped. Haven't used the bug net yet but I'm definitely giving it a shot once summer comes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarrowind

customer_reviews.title: Great for small babies
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, it does what it’s intended to do. I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I don’t recommend this for babies 6 months and up or babies with long legs. When my little one kicks frequently it rises up exposing his feet. Which sucks for us living in North Dakota in -40 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Donellan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It reminds me of jogging suit material with a more cotton feel it’s pretty thick. This is perfect for colder months, so maybe fall and definitely winter. Was definitely to hot for summer would be extremely dangerous if used in warm weather even when in the shade. I stress that because there wasn’t anything in the reviews about use in warm weather when I bought it so I thought it would be used year round. I couldn’t get the netted part to work it came with zero instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I had a different product for the car seat but it didn’t fit correctly and my baby’s face was uncovered. When I found this I was iffy but once I received it, it was super easy to use, soft, and my baby could be completely covered when going out side when it’s super cold or raining. I would recommend this to anyone with an infant or looking for a great baby gift
customer_reviews.author: Destiny A

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this for our road trip to Colorado during Thanksgiving to help insulate/keep our baby from the cold elements. It has worked out quite nice still. Our baby is 5months and I think soon won't be able to use it only because he is getting too long and the cover might bother him, not sure though. We have loved using this cover though, it stays on, doesn't fall off, haven't had issues with the zippers or snaps, I wash it in the washing machine but hang it to dry, and it's gotten the job done that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car seat cover. I get compliments when people see it. I leave it on so it doesn’t get in the way too often when I place my little one in/out of the seat. It is a bit of a hassle to take the car seat out of the base in the car with the cover covering the latch (makes it slippery), but when you get use to it, it becomes easy. I love the mesh covering during these summer days because it keeps all kinds of flies from her. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Must have for infant car seat !
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! My mother always complained that I wasn’t covering the baby enough so I figured I should get a real cover for the car seat. It’s very stretchy and cute! I love how you can zip it up/down so it can keep people from touching the baby or bothering her when she’s sleeping. There is also the net cover thing that is nice when I bring her outside to keep bugs out while letting her see her surroundings. This is a must have for infant car seats!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product to buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product recently and are quite happy with the use. It provides a snug fit to the car seat, protects the baby from any flies or insects while we take our child for walking, also from any cold air during fall/winter times. May not be ideal to use in summer. Material is durable and it stretches quite well to fit around the car seat. So far, we are glad that we found this product on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: dheepak

customer_reviews.title: This is perfection!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best baby products! It’s soft and it’s luxurious, it’s super easy to install and remove, it’s just perfect!!! My newborn has the option of being completely protected from curious strangers full of germs or peaking out in the backseat of my car so I can watch her breath properly and I can’t wait for the summer to use the mesh to block her from evil mosquitoes. I’m very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: I did not feel like this breathable so I returned it. It’s a very thick fabric. Living in Hawaii this is not ideal cause of the heat. I thought I could use it to protect baby from the germs but then I felt bad if he got too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Customer from

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! It is adorable and I’ve gotten more compliments on it than expected. It fits perfectly, is nice and stretchy, and I love that the inside is such a soft warm material. I feel good that my son is protected while we are out, especially since he is under 3 months. It is easy to get on/off and I think this is a definite for everyone’s registry! Ps just make sure if you keep it on the car seat while it’s on the base, that the cover doesn’t interfere with any of the connections btwn car seat and base.
customer_reviews.author: lb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cover
customer_reviews.text: I receive compliments on this every day. Perfect for a winter baby- the lined inside keeps the baby warm and dry. The material is thick and keeps her dry if it is snowing or raining- it is not waterproof and would eventually leak so I wouldn't go out for more than five minutes in a rain storm. Easy to zip up or zip down once in the car. The stripes are not on the inside but baby is able to see the pattern as there is some light that is let though- she loves the pattern! Nice colors for a boy or girl.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice and snug on Graco Carseat
customer_reviews.text: We have a Graco Snugride 360 carseat and this cover worked perfectly for our needs! Our baby was born in the middle of winter in Utah and this cover kept him warm! I also loved that it helped him to stay asleep while we were out and about as it helped to block out light but it was easy to check on him with the zippers! This cover is easy to take on and off and it stays secure, it doesn't blow around in the wind or get in the way of holding the carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the fall, winter, and spring months. It fits perfectly over the car seat carrier. Easy to remove and wash. And it has a nice bug net to protect from mosquitoes and other bugs. Overall, I love the color, pattern, and stretch durability. To see more product reviews and photos visit my amazon profile page and follow me for more amazon baby product reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Monay Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for rain or colder weather
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking it would be easier to wrap up the whole carseat rather than wrap up the baby in too may layers for the straps of the carseat. It works well and easy to leave the zipper open a little for baby to see out, and to carry. It's great for the rain as well and brining into the house to block the light for a sleeping baby.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Lynch

customer_reviews.title: This carseat cover is THE BEST.
customer_reviews.text: Myself and anyone who sees this thing are in love with it. It keeps *most* of the wind and other elements out and my newborn LOVED the high contrast pattern of black/white. It's super breathable, quality material and cozy for baby. I looked forever to find just the right seat cover, and thankfully I ended up purchasing a good one. I haven't had a chance to use the netting yet, but I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DixieColeslaw

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this car seat cover. It's cute, and keeps light and wind out of my baby's face. One complaint I have is that it's not too breathable. I've experienced my 2 month old get really hot and sweating so much to the point that his clothes were damp, even with the windows down or AC blasted up high. I even leave it open and still the same. I also have a specific car seat where the seatbelt needs to be strapped across and clipped, this cover makes it a longer process to have that happen. That would be my only two complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Barillas

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’ve used this all winter and am very happy with my purchase. I live in North Florida, so my winters aren’t as brutal as up north, but I haven’t had to load my baby up with clothes. I just put on her regular winter clothes and zip the cover up when we go outside. Plus, it keeps unwanted hands out of her carrier. It’s been great!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d discovered this before my third baby
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The material is great quality and it’s really stretchy so it’s easy to fit over my baby’s car seat. I love that I can zip him in to protect him from bad weather and people getting to close with their nasty germs, especially with covid going on. I feel so much better taking him to the pediatrician knowing he’s protected inside this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amber H

customer_reviews.title: I put a lot of thought into a carseat cover this time around.
customer_reviews.text: I put a lot of thought into a carseat cover this time around. I didnt want something that only goes around the seat part and lays right on top of baby. This was exactly what I wanted, something that would be up off of him. Must be used with a base of course, unless you want to take the cover on and off every time baby is in and out of the car. My only negative comment being all my 5 month old has to do is stretch his legs in the right direction and the cover pops off the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hiser

customer_reviews.title: Super soft interior, stretchy and easy to unzip and sip!! Use it everyday and love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a new cover as my last was just a canopy and would fly all over, I cannot say being a mom with my sixth baby, I wish I had this for all of them... I opened it and was amazed at how soft the interior is, I mean super soft and the print I got the clouds, it’s adorable.. it does occasionally unsnap at the top, but still stays in place, this thing is awesome for the winter with the snow and rain, keeps my little one safe and snug!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly surprised with how pleased I am with this cover after all of the reviews that I had read. But it’s the right amount of thickness and perfect for a winter baby to block the cold air but not too much that you’d worry about baby being able to breathe comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Sairah

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Four stars just because it didn’t work for us. We have a click connect from Graco and he easily kicked this off the bottom. After it came off he would cry because it was against his legs. He wasn’t in any danger when this happened but obviously not a great situation. Love the concept and it might have worked for a younger baby. Easy to return. I’d try it if you’re thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the material and how it has the opening on the front! That way I don’t need to completely remove the cover to get baby in and out. It fits really well on my Chicco keyfit 30, and I haven’t had any issues with it sliding around. Blocks the wind really well, also. Will be too hot in the texas summer but lo will be old enough to not need it then!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hunter

customer_reviews.title: The cover itself is the best cover i’ve purchased for our car seat
customer_reviews.text: The cover itself is the best cover i’ve purchased for our car seat. However, the bottons that snap around the handle come off very easily. They are not sown into the fabric very well. This has happened twice, as I’ve returned the first one and had the same thing happen with the second
customer_reviews.author: LYNN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PRODUCT!! I have received so many compliments on this! I have twins so this makes it easy on me when I’m out and about and people try to peek in or reach in. Having newborns in winter is not a great mix. It’s a nice settle way that babies are unavailable at this time lol. Easy to put on. Have washed twice and do not lose their thickness. Nice soft and very good material. Zipper is a fabulous idea!! Great to get 2 babies in and out. Storage pouch is also great to put pacifiers or burp clothes in (second usage)! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: YvonneY

customer_reviews.title: The material and concept were great, but it didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: The material and concept were great, but it didn't work for us. The stretchy portion at the base would ride up on our carseat (Brittax), and uncover the babies legs. It would also pop up if she kicked it at all--her legs don't even extend past the edge of the seat yet. The material was soft and stain resistant, but we ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cover EVER
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this car seat cover! We recently decided to purchase after reading great reviews and realizing we rather use a cover than constantly lugging extra blankets around to cover her from the cold. This is soft so stretch and great quality! I do wish the net wasn’t attached so we could remove when not in use but it does fold up and go into the pocket very well! I’m so excited to use the net feature when our 6month old goes to her older brothers tball games in the spring! Best cover we have ever used and this is baby #4 ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kindra

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my little one who was born in the winter. Still need a blanket inside but kept the wind and curious onlookers away. Love how it fits around the car seat handle. We have a Graco carrier. The cover doesn't wrap as far down on the carrier as shown in picture. It's easy to put on and pop off to wash. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KMorris

customer_reviews.title: Nice WARM car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat cover! It covers my baby and keeps her nice & warm. Because of that I don’t have to put so many layers on her in the winter months. The first time I used it I put a snowsuit on her and she was pretty hot. So you don’t have to put too many clothes on baby. Also, the designs look great on this! She loves to sleep with it on so she must love it too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Just a car seat cover/Shaw BUT!! I’m in love!! This this SOOOOOO SOFT ON THE INSIDE!!!! I haven’t used it as a cover Shaw yet but man when I do lol!!! It’s perfect! It stretches amazing! The zipper part is awesome and the netting is so nice to just pull down to keep people from touching her just awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Samantha

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: First of all.. This car seat cover is beautiful!! It is so well made, stretchy and thick. I am so happy with this purchase. I live in Michigan where the winters are COLD and I feel confident that my baby will be warm with this cover on her car seat. Buy this car seat cover and tell all your mom friends to buy it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Norris

customer_reviews.title: Best cover ever, but snaps popped off with minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for my 2nd baby, and I love everything about it!! However, I just purchased it in October, and it is only December, and the snaps have all popped off. Luckily, I am still able to exchange for another one. Hopefully the replacement will last longer, as I really do love this cover!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful price and versatility
customer_reviews.text: This car seat cover is fantastic! We have a winter baby and didn't want ti have to throw layers of clothing on our newborn just to go from our house to our car so I needed a cover that would keep her snug and warm, this car seat does the trick! We love the material and the optod the mosquito net for the spring and summer, we live in a mosquito infested area. It fits our Graco snug ride infant car seat perfectly! We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: 2020 Nice but not gift friendly I like the car seat cover. It is made with beautiful fabric and is a good quality. The only thing I don’t like is the packaging it came in. It is shipped in just a clear bag. This was a baby shower gift and the recipient didn’t even know what it was until I explained what it was in the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Landa

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent but some parts need work
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this product five stars but unfortunately I can't. I do love this product but the quaily control is lacking in some parts the snaps around the handle are all wonky and in different spots on either side and one is half out of the fabic I don't see it lasting as long as I would have liked due to this. But for the rest of the cover it is of great quailty and soer soft and seems like it will be warm with a blanket in the winter months the mosquito netting is as great feature as well. And I like that it folds up into itself for storage
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Protects from weather, didnt receive net.
customer_reviews.text: I received my order quickly and I am impressed! I have tried other covers before and this is by far is the best! It fits my carseat very snugly. My issues with other covers were that they either weren't snug enough to were the wind moved the cover all around and was pointless. Or that it didnt close all the way and left an opening that could just be flapping in the wind or pulled down by my child. This cover zips all the way up and fully protects your my child from the weather. My ONLY ISSUE is that some people received a net but I did not!
customer_reviews.author: ReNee Bruke

customer_reviews.title: Still able to carry on my arm!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps Baby warm! I was shocked at how much heat it keeps inside the carrier. The material is super soft and stretchy. I was concerned at how easily I would be able to fit my arm through the opening since that's how I, along with most others, carry the car seat. But because the material is so stretchy and there are 2 snaps on each side, I just leave one snap open to allow the cover to slide down one side of the handle a bit and my arm slides in very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover, protect my baby from wind, rain, snow and cold, it really keeps the temperature warm I use it with a blanket (30 degrees Fahrenheit / 0 degrees Celsius) another point in favor is that it does not cover the nose of My baby, when I put it in a car it is easy to remove and place again, I can lower a zipper to see it without having to wake it up, I really recommend it (it works for britax b-safe 35)
customer_reviews.author: Carol G

customer_reviews.title: it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I love how I can put my arm through with out causing a gap like most stretchy covers. Does stay in place although sometimes it's a pain in the butt to put it back on if it pops off in the car. Also, we are in Texas and in "our kind of cold" she can get really hot in this very easily. Besides, those two issues its great!
customer_reviews.author: BulldogMama

customer_reviews.title: Snaps failled at 1st tryed
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this car seat cover, I am very desappointed, as soon as I tried it on the snaps stayed in my hand without even putting any pressure on it... It broke before I could even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Manon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 18 months now. We use this every time we went out and we got lots of compliments. Compliments on the color, how it covers all around, the mesh and the softness. So many questions, where did we buy it and was it expensive? Very soft, very comfortable and inexpensive. You will never find something like this at the store with this price and pretty color. I love it! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Irene K

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cover! So much better than the other options out there. I have been using it for the last 2 winter months and loved it! My baby stayed warm in her carseat, protected from wind and rain, this winter thanks to this and it protected her from peoples being in her face and wanting to touch/kiss her and from their coughs, especially being in flu season... Have no complaints about this cover, and it looks very nice. I have been recommending this product to every person that is pregnant or has a baby. Probably will be using this for the next few months still, until summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really love this thing. It is thick as soft, and cuts the wind on blustery days and keeps the rain off between the car and the house. It’s not waterproof, so not for long rain jaunts, and it’s not touching your baby so it’s not really for warmth. It works well for us with a blanket tucked in. I like that it doesn’t zip over her nose like many of them, and it’s stretchyness to fit over any carrier. It could be tighter and longer, to perfect it.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this cover! It’s so soft, fits My Graco dear great, super cute design, great quality! Better than I expected! One thing I didn’t realize it had was a mesh cover that you can put over the top if you are outside to keep out mosquitos, bugs, leaves, etc but don’t want baby all zipped up under it! It’s attached and is just in a little compartment when you aren’t using it! LOVE! My only complaint is that I didn’t know about this in the fall when we were camping!! I’ll be getting my sister and sister in law one for baby presents this spring! 😍💕
customer_reviews.author: mwebb7

customer_reviews.title: Functional cover
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought the milk snob cover but that is tooo thin for the winter time. This cover is so soft and fits snug in the car seat. It doesn’t go down too far so it doesn’t get caught in the car seat base which is awesome since my other covers would get stuck. The zipper function is just overall great and easy to function. If you are looking for something to to leave on the car seat and to keep baby protected from cold get this you won’t regret it plus it’s half the price of most covers. Any way I can’t wait To try out the mesh cover for the summer time!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Garcia

customer_reviews.title: A must have for new borns
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice color and matches the car seats, its nice and thick so it can cover from the wind and light rain. You wouldnt want to be out with it too long in the rain as it would soak through, But this is a must have for your new borns in the winter. It also has a mosquito net.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a baby shower gift, and she loves it. It's actually even prettier in person, and is very soft. The cover is very breathable, but also very practical to use in colder weather. My niece was born in early December, so they've been using it for a few weeks now. She seems very pleased with It!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We really like it but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the look and the material is great/breathable for this hot Texas heat. There's this netting that will be wonderful if we are sitting outside at events to keep flies away but the compartment to keep it in does not have a closure. No zipper/button/nothing and it keeps falling down on my son when we drive. I'm going to have to use a safety pin or something to keep it in place. Seems like a design flaw
customer_reviews.author: Angelisse

customer_reviews.title: We love this cover
customer_reviews.text: We love this cover!! We get so many compliments from friends, family, doctor's office, and strangers. Everyone thinks it not only looks nice but functions well. I love how you can zip down the front and creat a window for air circulation. There is also a pouch on the top flap and that is convenient for pacifiers. I like the option to zip it all up too if it is cold outside or if we walk near someone smoking or coughing.
customer_reviews.author: discotae

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought the material would be T-shirt thin and non protective but I was proven wrong. It’s actually kind of thick and protects baby from elements. It’s very soft and very stretchy to fit both car seats which are different brands. I highly recommend this cover
customer_reviews.author: Whitney H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing car seat cover you’ll ever buy!!! First of all, the hip mom’s at target all have this carrier. Second, it’s so breathable, light weight and stylish. We had our baby in October and it was perfect in the winter. I loved using it in the stores, she was completely covered by strangers, but didn’t feel trapped. Washes up very well, no shrinkage
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cooper

product_meta.title: Stretchy Baby Car Seat Covers for Boys Girls, Infant Car Canopy Spring Autumn Winter,Snug Warm Breathable Windproof, Adjustable Peep Window,Universal Fit,Baby Elephant
feature_bullets: PATENTED STYLISH BABY CAR SEAT COVERS for boys and girls fit your baby car seats in just seconds.Gives baby full protection from winds,drizzle,bright lights, create a cozy and quiet environment. Perfect for napping during outings

ADJUSTABLE OPENING with two zippers allow mom to take a peep at baby and easily remove baby without taking the baby car seat covers off. You can adjust zippers of infant car seat covers canopy in order to modify light,ventilation, visibility,and temperature.
The stretch anti-mesh folds down from the backside pouch, fits over front to give baby more light and fresh air while still being protected by falling leaves.
UNIVERSAL FIT & EASY INSTALL-- The light breathable stretch fabric and 4 snaps ensure secure fit on most baby car seats. Snaps keep infant car seat covers in place even in extreme winds.
PERFECT GIFT FOR SUMMER & AUTUMN: Get AMAZLINEN versatile baby car seat cover as an amazing gift for a baby shower, a mom-to-be or a new mom! It will quickly become moms' most loved essential!
